name: HIV_G
title: HIV.G Diagnostics  CodeSystem
description: CodeSystem for HIV.G Diagnostics  Data Elements

concept.definition: CD4 cell count in cells/mm^3
CD4 cell percentage
CD4 result from first CD4 test performed (such as at treatment initiation), also may be called CD4 at ART initiation or at ART start

concept.display: Date of baseline CD4 count sample collection
concept.definition: Date and time when baseline CD4 count test sample was collected
The client's first CD4 count from baseline CD4 test performed (such as at treatment initiation) was a count of <200 cells/mm3
Date sample to be used for CD4 count was collected
A viral load test was performed

concept.display: Date of viral load sample collection
concept.definition: Date and time when the sample was collected to test the client's HIV viral load

concept.display: Date of first viral load sample collection
concept.definition: Date and time when the sample was collected to test the client's HIV viral load for the first time
Date viral load sample sent to the lab
Result from the initial viral load test in number of copies/mL
Result from the viral load test in number of copies/mL
The type of specimen to be used to test viral load

concept.display: Liquid plasma specimen for viral load testing
concept.definition: Liquid plasma and using ethylenediaminetetraacetic acid (EDTA) or plasma preparation tubes for viral load test
Dried blood spot specimen (DBS) for viral load test

concept.display: Dried plasma spot from a plasma separation card
concept.definition: Dried plasma spot from a plasma separation card for viral load test
Date client was tested for hepatitis B virus (HBV)
Hepatitis B virus test result (HBsAg)
HBsAg test result was positive
HBsAg test result was negative
HBsAg test result was indeterminate

concept.display: Reason Hepatitis B test not conducted
concept.definition: Reason why a hepatitis B test was not done

concept.display: Test delayed to next contact or referred
concept.definition: Test has been delayed to the next contact or client was referred to another provider/facility
Test out of stock or stock present but expired
